entry.title: Current Research
entry.summary: A subjectivity that foregoes the I for retelling the self through the other. An embodied philosophy of cognition. The psychosomatics of creativity....
entry.content:
• A subjectivity that foregoes the I for retelling the self through the other.
  • An embodied philosophy of cognition.
  • The psychosomatics of creativity.

entry.title: Performances
entry.summary: June 20th, 16h00, performance @ Het Wilde Weten, Rotterdam. June 24th, 20h00, proclamation for 'Nieuwe Garde Den Haag vraagt...'on the holy tasks of the creative class. or: 'deel twee van het columnfeuilleton over de heilige opdracht van de creatieve zuil'....
entry.content:
June 20th, 16h00, performance @ Het Wilde Weten, Rotterdam.

June 24th, 20h00, proclamation for 'Nieuwe Garde Den Haag vraagt...'on the holy tasks of the creative class. or: 'deel twee van het columnfeuilleton over de heilige opdracht van de creatieve zuil'. Website.

entry.title: New Job
entry.summary: Eric became a lecturer in Interactive Media Design at the department of Graphic Design of the Royal Academy of Art. See also Linkedin....
entry.content:
Eric became a lecturer in Interactive Media Design at the department of Graphic Design of the Royal Academy of Art.

See also Linkedin.

entry.title: Items
entry.summary: The current issue of Items magazine contains a visual reportage by Rowan McCuskey who visits Eric and other artists and designers in the DCR....
entry.content: The current issue of Items magazine contains a visual reportage by Rowan McCuskey who visits Eric and other artists and designers in the DCR.
